thread.title: Tracey Duncan

author: Tracey Duncan
title: Tracey Duncan
text: Need to lower shipping prices and some candy prices. I can buy candy locally cheaper than what you sell it for when in stock. Also, you need to have same amount of candy in SweetTarts Heart bags. You have five flavors, 250 pieces per bag. You need to bag 50 pieces per each flavor so you don't run out of any one flavor. Some people use all five flavors to make a serving.
